TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1319

barker_notes.barker_summary: Scriggins in account with Pettus, May 1, 1826. Price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1319

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Scriggins in account with Pettus, May 1, 1826. Price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**person_mentioned*Colo Scriggins*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Wm Pettus Dr*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-01-1826">May 1st 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*7 meals_______________________________________________________ $2. 62 1/2*/p*
*p*32 pounds of salt_______________________________________________ 2. 56 1/4*/p*
*p*Medacin from *person_mentioned*Nuccolds*/person_mentioned*_________________________________________ 5. —*/p*
*p*1 meal for young man___________________________________________ 37 1/2*/p*
*p*1 Dress for Lady---------------------------------------------------------------------- 3.—*/p*
*p*1 Handkerchief________________________________________________ 1.*/p*
*p*$14. 56 1/4*/p*
*p*Recived payment in full by *person_mentioned*Mrs. Skriggins Administratress*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-19-1827">Octo- ber 19th 1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned*Wm Pettus*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Recived 2 Horses from *person_mentioned*Mrs. Skriggins*/person_mentioned* one at $155 the other a $120___$275.*/p*
*p*Credit by her Act______________________________________________ 14.56 1/4*/p*
*p*260. 43 3/4*/p* *p*Balance Due which is to be paid in Land at 50 Cents an acre which amounts to 521 Acres which is to be paid off agreeable to Instructions*/p*
*/div1*
